citations.narrative:
The facility's annual report for the previous 2024 federal fiscal year has not been submitted by the required deadline of
December 1 to the Deputy Administrator. The annual report ensures accountability for research animals by reporting
numbers on an annual basis, and is essential to evaluate the information provided in the reports to assure the care and
use of animals were followed according to the Animal Welfare Act regulations. Each reporting facility shall submit an
annual report, covering the use of live animals in the previous fiscal year, on or before December 1st of each calendar
year.
Correct by February 28, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Institutional Officer.
Additional Inspectors:
Alexandra Calderon, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.36(a) 
   
Annual report. 
The facility's annual report for the previous 2024 federal fiscal year has not been submitted by the required deadline of 
December 1 to the Deputy Administrator. The annual report ensures accountability for research animals by reporting 
numbers on an annual basis, and is essential to evaluate the information provided in the reports to assure the care and 
use of animals were followed according to the Animal Welfare Act regulations. Each reporting facility shall submit an 
annual report, covering the use of live animals in the previous fiscal year, on or before December 1st of each calendar 
year. 
 
Correct by February 28, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Institutional Officer. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Alexandra Calderon, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
